mapper.insert: insert into tp_user_level (level_id, level_name, amount, discount, describe) values (#{level_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{level_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discount,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select level_id, level_name, amount, discount, describe from tp_user_level
select level_name from tp_user_level where level_id= #{level}
